title: recipes_Sautéed_Scallops
text:
Title: Sautéed Scallops.
.
Description: Sautéed scallops in butter with crushed garlic and fresh rosemary; a very simple yet incredibly delicious shellfish main dish for two!.
.
Ingredients:.
- 0.25 cup butter.
- 2 cloves crushed garlic.
- 2 sprigs fresh rosemary.
- 1 pound scallops.
.
Instructions:.
- Melt butter in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat; add crushed garlic and whole sprigs of rosemary..
- Place scallops in skillet and cook until golden brown on one side, about 2 to 3 minutes. Turn scallops over and continue to cook until firm and opaque, about 1 or 2 minutes more..
- Remove crushed garlic and rosemary sprigs from the pan before serving..
.
Nutrients:.
calories: 409 kcal.
carbohydrateContent: 7 g.
cholesterolContent: 136 mg.
fiberContent: 0 g.
proteinContent: 39 g.
saturatedFatContent: 15 g.
sodiumContent: 530 mg.
fatContent: 25 g.
unsaturatedFatContent: 0 g.
.
Serves: 2 servings.
